text: akasagalalli mattu bhumiyalliruva ellavu allahanige seride. Nivu nim'ma manadolagina sangatigalannu vyaktapadisidaru guptavagittaru, allahanantu a kuritu nim'madane vicarane nadesuvanu. A balika avanu tanicchisidavarannu ksamisuvanu mattu tanicchisidavarannu siksisuvanu. Allahanu ellavannu madaballavanagiddane
